body.name: Aokeo USB Gaming Microphone, Condenser Microphone for PC/MAC/PS4/PS5/Phone-Cardioid Mic with RGB Lighting Headphone Output Volume Control,Mute Button,for Streaming Podcast YouTube Discord
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 6 mins
features: High Quality Audio: AOKEO AK-1i USB condenser microphone provides you with excellent audio quality. It can automatically reduce background noise and restore your clear sound.

Easy Plug and Play Settings: With a simple USB connection, this gaming microphone can work for you. And it is compatible with various devices such as computers, laptops, MAC, PS4/5, etc. Note: Not compatible with XBOX.

Multi Function Knob: This microphone knob not only quickly adjusts the volume of the microphone, but also allows you to know if the microphone is muted. When the RGB light is in a gradient state, it indicates that the microphone is working. When you click the knob, the RGB light will turn purple, and the microphone is in a mute state. Long press to turn off the RGB light.

Powerful Chip: Adopting a 192kHz/24bit professional capacitor microphone chip, with a cardioid pointing design. Make your voice clear and smooth like flowing water. The gradient lighting fills your game and work environment with atmosphere. Very suitable for games, podcasts, studios, and streaming media.

All AOKEO products offer a free one-year warranty and a one month refund policy. If you are looking for an entry-level USB podcast microphone that emits practicality, please trust it. It is based on simple operations and can automatically adjust your audio, helping you effortlessly control it.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page If you are a beginner and want to buy a cost-effective USB capacitive game microphone. Please choose AOKEO AK-1i. It is very simple to use, plug and play. Excellent audio quality can meet your daily gaming, podcasting, and recording needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am surprised
reviews.reviewText: It’s amazing. Good sounds.all noise is eliminated. clear sound . I'm pleasantly surprised. it's easy to connect. very nice price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice microphone with perfect outlook design.
reviews.reviewText: I used to use the microphone on my webcam for almost all occasions. But a big problem for a webcam microphone is that there is no hardware switch to turn off the microphone, and a lot of times if I forgot to mute myself on the software, there may be some embarrassment happening. So that's why I decided to purchase this microphone, mostly for it's hardware mute button to save myself from being worried all the time. And the sound quality is certainly better than I expected given the price range. My friends told me that the sound quality sounds much better with my new microphone. And because it's a separate device, I can conveniently move it around to get the best sound quality. So overall, I am happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: The first thing I noticed when I took this out of the box was how light it was. There's a little ball-swivel thing on the bottom so you can angle the mic how you wish. It's easy to mute yourself and I enjoy the pink color it turns when you are muted. I noticed when recording myself you can hear when you turn the knob, so I'd suggest muting yourself before fiddling with it. From about a foot away, you might sound a bit tinny, but if you move closer to the mic, it's much better quality. I'd suggest using a pop filter with this mic if possible. Overall, it's a good option for those with a lower price range as long as you are aware of its few little nuances. It's quite cute (smaller than my hands) and its visual design is lovely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price this is a great microphone. USB plug in and it works. You can mute it by clicking the button and adjust the colors. The sound intake adjustment works. Overall this is a good cheap mic for the price. Some improvements are to turn off the color and to include an on off switch. Other than that it serves its purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really great quality
reviews.reviewText: I really like how the roller for changing volume works (very satisfying!), also from the moment you take the microphone in your hands you can tell is good build quality, the grid on top for protecting the microphone seems almost made out of metal, and I love the fact that it lits up with all the led's (and also the fact that it has a usb attachment!). I like the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars AI era microphone
reviews.reviewText: Its ok sound quality when its working. Updated: after 2 weeks used, parts came off and cheap material found inside. Had to return it, annoying. better to find different product, save your time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice colorful microphone
reviews.reviewText: I Got this microphone for zoom calling and making videos. It was easy to set up. The price is good 👍too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No clear way to turn on and off.
reviews.reviewText: Odd power settings don’t specify whether it can be on without having its lights on.

Love this product it’s light weight and easy to use. I love how easy it is to navigate and hold up. Just an fyi for a really good sound quality for your videos make sure you put the volume all the way up or close to that so you can hear yourself really well. If you have a MacBook make sure you allow the sound of the mic to be on and you can do that by going to settings and going to sound. But all and all definitely worth the money 10/10 :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was bought by for my 9 year old son to help complete his gaming setup. He wanted a microphone (because that is what you need apparently) that was simple to setup and use.This one is great! The setup was pretty much plug and play, apart from needing to change to input source then good to go. Did a quick microphone test on windows 11 and came back 100%.For the money he thinks it's perfect. He loves the fact it changes colour and muting it is a one button operation.When it's muted it lights up and stays pink with the light feature switched on. The gain knob is a nice movement and allows for plenty of play depending on what you are doing.He loves it and although his headset has a microphone, he loves using this instead…….because that’s cool apparently!!There is plenty of movement in the base to allow you to position it just how you want it. The colour changes are subtle and just bright enough.All in all a good purchase.
Bought this to do short videos. Looks nice and function very well. Voice are clear and sound is solid. Noise reduction works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Okay sound and some decent RGB for the gamers
reviews.reviewText: Construction feels a bit light and plastic and the mount is not isolated so if you place it too close to your computer then it does pick up knocks and bumps through your desk. If you remove the stand and attach it to a microphone arm (you can get them for about £15) then this noise is greatly reduced. It connects via USB and you can plug in a set of headphones to a jack on the mic. There is a suitable amount of RGB for a gaming peripheral and the RGB will indicate the status of the mute function.Sound quality isn't bad. Certainly for gaming, especially with a stand, your voice will come through well with not too much background noise. There isn't any active noise cancellation which is not surprising at this price point.So overall I am giving this 4 stars. The sound is not too bad and it certainly looks the part as well as having the remote volume and mute feature. If you are looking for sound quality particularly then you might want to pay a bit more but otherwise this is worth consideration.
